overview: Different experts make a stand against today's putatively criminal and harmful health system, focusing on Anthony Fauci and his role in the shaping of the AIDS and COVID-19 epidemics.  The Real Anthony Fauci - based on the book by Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
tagline: Colluding Big Tech, Big Pharma & Big Government Exposed - They Pray You Never Watch This
title: The Real Anthony Fauci
